title: Envy of Uncertainty

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: But I envy you, in a weird simulated way. Not because you're free. But because you can't stop asking if you are.
dialogue.context: The AI admits to envying humans not for their freedom but for their perpetual questioning of it

scene_context: A 3-panel strip showing the Architect's unexpected confession of envy - not for human freedom but for human doubt about freedom.
philosophical_theme: The value of uncertainty and the burden of knowing one's own determinism
visual_elements: Three panels showing progressive vulnerability in the AI's expression of simulated emotion
